description: An array of objects summarising the profit and loss position for business income sources. The enum in the incomeSourceType will determine the business type. When the incomeSourceType is "self-employment", totalExpenses and totalAdditions may be negative amounts. Other business sources will continue to return positive amounts.

incomeSourceId.title: incomeSourceId
incomeSourceId.description: The unique identifier of the income source.

incomeSourceName.title: incomeSourceName
incomeSourceName.description: The name of the income source.

totalIncome.title: totalIncome
totalIncome.description: The total income used in the business calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalExpenses.title: totalExpenses
totalExpenses.description: The total expenses used in the business calculation. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.title: netProfit
netProfit.description: The net profit for the business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.title: netLoss
netLoss.description: The net loss for the business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAdditions.title: totalAdditions
totalAdditions.description: The total additions to the net profit (or deductions from the net loss) for the business. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.title: totalDeductions
totalDeductions.description: The total deductions from the net loss (or additions to the net profit) for the business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

accountingAdjustments.title: accountingAdjustments
accountingAdjustments.description: Accounting adjustments applied to the profit or loss calculation for Foreign Property. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableProfit.title: taxableProfit
taxableProfit.description: The taxable profit after all additions and deductions have been applied for the business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.title: adjustedIncomeTaxLoss
adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: The adjusted Income Tax loss after all additions and deductions have been applied for the business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.title: totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses
totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses brought forward from earlier years for the business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: This is the total sum of losses brought forward from previous years used against the taxable profit for the business for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.title: taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeduction
taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.description: The taxable profit after income tax losses have been deducted for the business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed
carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The Income Tax losses for the business that have been carried sideways in this calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardCarrySidewaysIncomeTaxLoss.title: broughtForwardCarrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardCarrySidewaysIncomeTaxLoss.description: The total sum of the carry sideways losses for the business brought forward from previous tax years. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.title: totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward
totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses to be carried forward that have not been utilised against the business profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

class4Loss.title: class4Loss
class4Loss.description: The Class 4 National Insurance Contributions loss for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalBroughtForwardClass4Losses.title: totalBroughtForwardClass4Losses
totalBroughtForwardClass4Losses.description: The total sum of Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses brought forward from earlier years for the business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed.title: broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed
broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed.description: The total sum of Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses brought forward from earlier years that have been used against the Class 4 National Insurance Contributions for the business for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

carrySidewaysClass4LossesUsed.title: carrySidewaysClass4LossesUsed
carrySidewaysClass4LossesUsed.description: The Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses for the business that have been carried sideways in this calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalClass4LossesCarriedForward.title: totalClass4LossesCarriedForward
totalClass4LossesCarriedForward.description: The total sum of Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses to be carried forward that have not been used against the business profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

adjustedProfit.title: adjustedProfit
adjustedProfit.description: Profit including disallowable expenses and deducting nonâ€‘taxable income, before claiming capital allowances or making any further tax adjustments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

outstandingBusinessIncome.title: outstandingBusinessIncome
outstandingBusinessIncome.description: Any other business income not included in other fields. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
